.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_DEVICE_QUEUE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkDeviceQueueCreateFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo-pQueuePriorities-parameter]] pname:pQueuePriorities must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:queueCount basetype:float values
* [[VUID-VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo-queueCount-arraylength]] pname:queueCount must: be greater than `0`
****
